solution_line_template: If there were {initial_members} members in the group before the admin removed {removed_members}, then {initial_members}-{removed_members} = <<{initial_members}-{removed_members}={remaining_members}>>{remaining_members} members remained after {removed_members} were removed.

The group members each posted {messages_per_member_per_day} messages in a day, a total of {messages_per_member_per_day}*{remaining_members} = <<{messages_per_member_per_day}*{remaining_members}={total_messages_per_day}>>{total_messages_per_day} messages.

In a week, with seven days, the group members would have posted {total_messages_per_day}*{days_in_week} = <<{total_messages_per_day}*{days_in_week}={total_messages_per_week}>>{total_messages_per_week} messages
